query:
SELECT `name`,
		       `text`,
		       `page`,
		       `language`, specific_to_group 
		  FROM site_text
		 WHERE (`language` = "en-US" OR `language` = "en")
		   AND (page = 'download' OR page = 'all' OR page = '' )  #pagefilter
		   AND (specific_to_group IS NULL OR specific_to_group = 0);
